temples.name: Boston, MA Temple
temples.services: Clothing rental available. No cafeteria available. No patron housing available. Distribution center nearby.
temples.history: The temple was announced on 30 September 1995. The groundbreaking was held on 13 June 1997. The temple was dedicated on 1 October 2000.
temples.ordinance: Initiatories are every half hour from 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM with a break from 1:00 PM to 5:30 PM.
temples.session: Endowment sessions begin at 10:00 AM, 12:00 PM, 6:00 PM, 7:00 PM
temples.closure: Saturday, 24 December 2022; Saturday, 31 December 2022; Monday, 20 March 2023 - Monday, 3 April 2023; Monday, 11 September 2023 - Monday, 25 September 2023

temples.name: San Juan, PR Temple
temples.address: 123 Calle Ronda, Urbanizacion Villa Andalucia, San Juan PR 00926
temples.history: The temple was announced on 7 October 2018. The groundbreaking was held on 4 May 2019. The temple will be dedicated on 15 January 2023.

temples.name: Salt Lake City, UT Temple
temples.address: 50 W North Temple St., Salt Lake City, UT 84150
temples.history: The temple was announced on 28 July 1847. The groundbreaking was held on 14 February 1853. The temple was dedicated on 6 April 1893. Closed for renovations.

temples.name: San Diego, CA Temple
temples.services: Clothing rental available. No cafeteria available. No patron housing available. Distribution center nearby.
temples.history: The temple was announced on 7 April 1984. The groundbreaking was held on 27 February 1988. The temple was dedicated on 25 April 1993.
temples.ordinance: Initiatories are every half hour from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM.
temples.session: Endowment sessions begin every half an hour at 8:00 AM until 7:00 PM
temples.closure: Saturday, 24 December 2022; Saturday, 31 December 2022; Monday, 20 March 2023 - Monday, 3 April 2023; Tuesday, 4 July 2023
